templates.title: Jupyter Notebook Editor
templates.description: Standalone Jupyter 5.5.0 Notebook editor for Python 3.6
templates.note: Deploys Jupyter Notebook editor with Python 3.6.5, Tensorflow 1.11.0 and Keras enabled.

templates.title: SparkCluster 3.0.2 - Zeppelin 0.10.0_snapshot - Python 3.6.12 - TF 2.4.1 - xpcore 1.1.4
templates.description: Spark 3.0.2 cluster with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) with Python 3.6.12 and Tensorflow 2.4.1
templates.note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.4.7 with Python 3.6.12, Tensorflow 2.4.0 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.10.0 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.
